data.title: The Same, and Different, Steve Blake
data.meta_description: We all tend to get a little romantic when viewing our sports, our teams, and our heroes.  We love to come up with nicknames, labels, and titles for famous games and moments.  Tales of antiquity are often used to draw comparisons to today’s warriors, and they’ve all been used – or perhaps overused.  Trail Blazers guard Steve Blake, who is a devout Christian, gets a bit of an embarrassed smile on his face when people bring up the David vs. Goliath story when describing his style of play and attitude.  Yes, he knows the story, and that tag, very well.
